formula: GNP.deflator ~ GNP + Unemployed + Armed.Forces + Population + Year + Employed
interpretation: No significant serial correlation detected up to order 1
description: Tests for serial correlation up to order 1. The LM (Chi-squared) statistic is asymptotically distributed as chi-squared with 1 degrees of freedom. The F statistic provides a finite-sample correction. Uses lmtest::bgtest.
